contentJson: ["This is the vision of Obadiah:",{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"This is what the Lord GOD says about Edom—","poem":1},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"We have heard a message from the LORD;","poem":1},{"text":"an envoy has been sent among the nations","poem":2},{"text":"to say, “Rise up,","poem":1},{"text":"and let us go to battle against her!”—","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
This is the vision of Obadiah: 
This is what the Lord GOD says about Edom— 
We have heard a message from the LORD; an envoy has been sent among the nations to say, “Rise up, and let us go to battle against her!”—

contentJson: [{"text":"“Behold, I will make you small among the nations;","poem":1},{"text":"you will be deeply despised.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: “Behold, I will make you small among the nations; you will be deeply despised.

contentJson: [{"text":"The pride of your heart has deceived you,","poem":1},{"text":"O dwellers in the clefts of the rocks","poem":2},{"noteId":0},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"whose habitation is the heights,","poem":2},{"text":"who say in your heart,","poem":1},{"text":"‘Who can bring me down to the ground?’","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
The pride of your heart has deceived you, O dwellers in the clefts of the rocks 
whose habitation is the heights, who say in your heart, ‘Who can bring me down to the ground?’

contentJson: [{"text":"Though you soar like the eagle","poem":1},{"text":"and make your nest among the stars,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"even from there I will bring you down,”","poem":2},"declares the LORD."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Though you soar like the eagle and make your nest among the stars, 
even from there I will bring you down,” declares the LORD.

contentJson: [{"text":"“If thieves came to you,","poem":1},{"text":"if robbers by night—","poem":2},{"text":"oh, how you will be ruined—","poem":1},{"text":"would they not steal only what they wanted?","poem":2},{"text":"If grape gatherers came to you,","poem":1},{"text":"would they not leave some gleanings?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: “If thieves came to you, if robbers by night— oh, how you will be ruined— would they not steal only what they wanted? If grape gatherers came to you, would they not leave some gleanings?

contentJson: [{"text":"But how Esau will be pillaged,","poem":1},{"text":"his hidden treasures sought out!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But how Esau will be pillaged, his hidden treasures sought out!

contentJson: [{"text":"All the men allied with you","poem":1},{"text":"will drive you to the border;","poem":2},{"text":"the men at peace with you","poem":1},{"text":"will deceive and overpower you.","poem":2},{"text":"Those who eat your bread","poem":1},{"noteId":1},{"text":"will set a trap for you","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"without your awareness of it.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
All the men allied with you will drive you to the border; the men at peace with you will deceive and overpower you. Those who eat your bread will set a trap for you 
without your awareness of it.

contentJson: [{"text":"In that day, declares the LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"will I not destroy the wise men of Edom","poem":2},{"text":"and the men of understanding","poem":1},{"text":"in the mountains of Esau?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: In that day, declares the LORD, will I not destroy the wise men of Edom and the men of understanding in the mountains of Esau?

contentJson: [{"text":"Then your mighty men, O Teman,","poem":1},{"text":"will be terrified,","poem":2},{"text":"so that everyone in the mountains of Esau","poem":1},{"text":"will be cut down in the slaughter.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Then your mighty men, O Teman, will be terrified, so that everyone in the mountains of Esau will be cut down in the slaughter.

contentJson: [{"text":"Because of the violence against your brother Jacob,","poem":1},{"text":"you will be covered with shame","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"and cut off forever.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Because of the violence against your brother Jacob, you will be covered with shame 
and cut off forever.

contentJson: [{"text":"On the day you stood aloof","poem":1},{"text":"while strangers carried off his wealth","poem":2},{"text":"and foreigners entered his gate","poem":1},{"text":"and cast lots for Jerusalem,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"you were just like one of them.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
On the day you stood aloof while strangers carried off his wealth and foreigners entered his gate and cast lots for Jerusalem, 
you were just like one of them.

contentJson: [{"text":"But you should not gloat in that day,","poem":1},{"text":"your brother’s day of misfortune,","poem":2},{"text":"nor rejoice over the people of Judah","poem":1},{"text":"in the day of their destruction,","poem":2},{"text":"nor boast proudly","poem":1},{"noteId":2},{"text":"in the day of their distress.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But you should not gloat in that day, your brother’s day of misfortune, nor rejoice over the people of Judah in the day of their destruction, nor boast proudly in the day of their distress.

contentJson: [{"text":"You should not enter the gate of My people","poem":1},{"text":"in the day of their disaster,","poem":2},{"text":"nor gloat over their affliction","poem":1},{"text":"in the day of their disaster,","poem":2},{"text":"nor loot their wealth","poem":1},{"text":"in the day of their disaster.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You should not enter the gate of My people in the day of their disaster, nor gloat over their affliction in the day of their disaster, nor loot their wealth in the day of their disaster.

contentJson: [{"text":"Nor should you stand at the crossroads","poem":1},{"text":"to cut off their fugitives,","poem":2},{"text":"nor deliver up their survivors","poem":1},{"text":"in the day of their distress.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Nor should you stand at the crossroads to cut off their fugitives, nor deliver up their survivors in the day of their distress.

contentJson: [{"text":"For the Day of the LORD is near","poem":1},{"text":"for all the nations.","poem":2},{"text":"As you have done, it will be done to you;","poem":1},{"text":"your recompense will return upon your own head.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For the Day of the LORD is near for all the nations. As you have done, it will be done to you; your recompense will return upon your own head.

contentJson: [{"text":"For as you drank on My holy mountain,","poem":1},{"text":"so all the nations will drink continually.","poem":2},{"text":"They will drink and gulp it down;","poem":1},{"text":"they will be as if they had never existed.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For as you drank on My holy mountain, so all the nations will drink continually. They will drink and gulp it down; they will be as if they had never existed.

contentJson: [{"text":"But on Mount Zion there will be deliverance,","poem":1},{"text":"and it will be holy,","poem":2},{"text":"and the house of Jacob","poem":1},{"text":"will reclaim their possession.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But on Mount Zion there will be deliverance, and it will be holy, and the house of Jacob will reclaim their possession.

contentJson: [{"text":"Then the house of Jacob will be a blazing fire,","poem":1},{"text":"and the house of Joseph a burning flame;","poem":2},{"text":"but the house of Esau will be stubble—","poem":1},{"text":"Jacob will set it ablaze and consume it.","poem":2},{"text":"Therefore no survivor will remain","poem":1},{"text":"from the house of Esau.”","poem":2},"For the LORD has spoken."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Then the house of Jacob will be a blazing fire, and the house of Joseph a burning flame; but the house of Esau will be stubble— Jacob will set it ablaze and consume it. Therefore no survivor will remain from the house of Esau.” For the LORD has spoken.

contentJson: [{"text":"Those from the Negev will possess the mountains of Esau;","poem":1},{"text":"those from the foothills","poem":2},{"noteId":3},{"text":"will possess the land of the Philistines.","poem":2},{"text":"They will occupy the fields of Ephraim and Samaria,","poem":1},{"text":"and Benjamin will possess Gilead.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Those from the Negev will possess the mountains of Esau; those from the foothills will possess the land of the Philistines. They will occupy the fields of Ephraim and Samaria, and Benjamin will possess Gilead.

contentJson: [{"text":"And the exiles of this host of the Israelites","poem":1},{"text":"will possess the land of the Canaanites as far as Zarephath;","poem":2},{"text":"and the exiles from Jerusalem who are in Sepharad","poem":1},{"text":"will possess the cities of the Negev.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: And the exiles of this host of the Israelites will possess the land of the Canaanites as far as Zarephath; and the exiles from Jerusalem who are in Sepharad will possess the cities of the Negev.

contentJson: [{"text":"The deliverers will ascend","poem":1},{"noteId":4},{"text":"Mount Zion","poem":1},{"text":"to rule over the mountains of Esau.","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"And the kingdom will belong to the LORD.","poem":1}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
The deliverers will ascend Mount Zion to rule over the mountains of Esau. 
And the kingdom will belong to the LORD.
